TITLE: Episode 94 - To Hell With the Human Haters
DESCRIPTION: This week, the Vixens are joined by Pierre Desrochers and Joanna Szurmak. Do you think the world is overpopulated? Do you see people as parasites feeding off of our environment and making it worse? Have you ever thought that maybe if we got rid of half the people, everything will be better? Well, that’s a big fat lie and Pierre and Joanna are here to tell us why.
